resources.string: Hello, I am developer SUPERYAO. This app could help you to complete the 1922 real-name registration more quickly, it\'s completely FREE and NO ADS. The app does NOT have internet permission, so it will NOT upload any sensitive information. If there is any question, please let me know. 😀
It\'s not the 1922 real-name registration QR Code.
Something went wrong when starting the sms app.
Just point the scan box at the QR Code.
It needs the permission of the camera to scan the QR Code.
Exit the app when scan completed
